Title: June 2024
Content: *p75806a01628*do not write in this area do not write in this area do not write in this area16  16 a student carried out an experiment to determine the young modulus ofcopper.  *(a) the student clamped one end of a copper wire to the bench. the wire passed over a pulley and masses were added to the other end of thewire.  a metre rule was fixed to the bench and a marker fixed to the wire, asshown. massespulleymetre rulecopper wireclampmarkerbench the student measured the diameter of the copperwire. describe the other measurements that need to be made using this apparatus and how they will be used to determine the young modulus ofcopper. you should define the meanings of any symbols youuse.(6)
